Literature.Title: Ultrashort antibacterial and antifungal lipopeptides
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2006;103:15997-16002
Literature.Author: Makovitzki A, Avrahami D, Shai Y

Literature.Title: Ultrashort peptide bioconjugates are exclusively antifungal agents and synergize with cyclodextrin and amphotericin B.
Literature.Author: Arnusch CJ, Ulm H, Josten M, Shadkchan Y, Osherov N, Sahl HG, Shai Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:8% Hemolysis=20 µM,Human erythrocytes:75% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=30 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli D21(MIC=3µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=6.25µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=12.5µM),Aspergillus fumigatus ATCC 26430(MIC=12.5µM),Aspergillus flavus ATCC 9643(MIC=12.5µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=12.5µM),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC MYA-422(MIC=1.5µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(LC50=>100µM)
